mapper.select: SELECT u.userName, u.id, c.cateNo, c.cateName, c.description, c.regDate FROM category c, blog b, users u WHERE b.userNo = c.userNo AND b.userNo = u.userNo AND u.id = #{value} ORDER BY c.regDate DESC

SELECT c.cateNo, c.userNo, c.cateName, c.description, c.regDate, p.postCount FROM category c, (SELECT cateNo, COUNT(*) postCount FROM post GROUP BY cateNo) p WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND c.cateNo = p.cateNo(+) ORDER BY cateNo DESC
SELECT id FROM users WHERE userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (cateNo, userNo, cateName, description, regDate) VALUES( seq_category_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{cateName}, #{description}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO post (postNo, cateNo, postTitle, postContent, regDate) VALUES( seq_post_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.postTitle, p.postContent FROM post p, (SELECT MAX(p.postNo) as postNo FROM post p, category c WHERE p.cateNo = c.cateNo AND c.userNo = #{userNo}) max WHERE p.postNo = max.postNo
SELECT u.userNo, p.cateNo, p.postNo, p.postTitle, p.regDate FROM post p, users u, category c WHERE u.userNo = #{userNo} AND u.userNo = c.userNo AND c.cateNo = p.cateNo(+) ORDER BY p.postNo DESC
